column1: It is important to note that 5වි10 is a deed that had been executed 125 years ago and the reference to
Joronis’s widow (ස්ත්‍රී සන්තකින්), is not only proof that Joronis was married, but also proof that he was
married before 1877 when community of property was in operation.
the following evidence of the 15th defendant (at page 967 of the appeal brief) is important as the learned
